Verses: 1 karththaave, En Irudhayam Irumaappulladhalla, En Kangal Mettimaiyullavaigalumalla; Periya Kaariyangalilum, Enakku Minjina Karumangalilum Naan Thalaiyidugiradhumillai.
2 thaayin Paal Marandha Kuzhandhaiyaip Pola, Naan En Aaththumaavai Adakki Amarappanninen; En Aaththumaa Paal Marandha Kuzhandhaiyaippol Irukkiradhu.
